duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to the strategic visions of the Marketing Department and assist with the implementation and evaluation of marketing tactics.
Develop and maintain a deep understanding of FHM subject matter, target audiences, and competitor activities.
Undertake daily administrative tasks to ensure the functionality and coordination of the department’s efforts.
Support visual branding initiatives and marketing collateral creation, including assets for social media, print collateral, signage, logo creation, layout design, and presentations.
Responsible for all in-house printing projects, including packaging and shipping.
Drive in-house business card production and distribution processes.
Manage the automation and distribution of closing gifts via the CRM platform.
Assist with the development of training and presentation materials.
Maintain inventory of promotional items and marketing collateral.
Update marketing contact databases and track leads across all marketing initiatives.
Provide ongoing marketing support and training to sales team members on an as-needed basis.
Assist with planning events and in-person marketing activities.

education_certification.credential: Four-year degree in Arts & Design, Communications, Marketing, or related field. 1-2 years relevant coursework or work experience. Strong online portfolio of creative and/or written work is a plus.
